synopsis.text: Is high school student Haruto Satou ready for an unexpected adventure when he follows his childhood friend and crush, Hime Nonaka, to her home world? After learning that Hime is actually Princess Crystal Novaty Nokanatica, destined to marry a prince to protect her kingdom, Haruto crashes the wedding and finds himself as the groom after a surprise kiss from Hime. But this is no ordinary wedding, as the newlyweds must now face a dangerous monster threatening the lives of all present. As the Ring King, Haruto must now gather the power of four other princesses to confront the powerful King of Abyssus and change the fate of their world. Will Haruto and his companions rise to the challenge and save the world, or will this new marriage be short-lived? Join them on this thrilling journey to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
